remarks: The value of an operation when the one of the arguments is a proper class.  Note: this theorem is dependent on our particular definitions of operation value, function value, and ordered pair.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ovprc1.1 $e |- Rel dom F $.
ovprc $p |- ( -. ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) -> ( A F B ) = (/) ) $.
